source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_000010_ALPHINAUD<tab>Ishgard cannot well endure another assault. Even should her knights succeed in turning back the Horde, the casualties will be catastrophic.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_000010_ALPHINAUD<tab>Ишгард не выдержит ещё одной полномасштабной атаки. Даже если рыцарям и удастся завернуть Орду, потери будут колоссальными.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_000020_TATARU<tab>But what other choice do we have? It's not like we can talk it over with them. Dragons and men aren't exactly on speaking terms.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_000020_TATARU<tab>Но у них нет другого выбора! Не то чтобы мы могли взять и заключить мирное соглашение. Драконы не станут говорить с людьми.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_000030_ALPHINAUD<tab>...With certain notable exceptions.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_000030_ALPHINAUD<tab>...Разве что лишь с некоторыми.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_000040_TATARU<tab>You don't mean...Iceheart!?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_000040_TATARU<tab>В смысле... Ледяное Сердце!?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_000050_ALPHINAUD<tab>When last you spoke with her, she lamented her crimes, did she not?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_000050_ALPHINAUD<tab>Когда ты в последний раз с ней <var 08 E905 ((имела)) ((имел)) /var> дело, она раскаивалась в своих грехах, верно?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_000060_ALPHINAUD<tab>Then there remains a sliver of hope. If we can persuade Iceheart to act as our intermediary, we may yet be able to convince Nidhogg to abandon his bloody course.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_000060_ALPHINAUD<tab>Значит, есть надежда. Если мы уговорим Ледяное Сердце служить в качестве посредника, мы можем попытаться убедить Нидхогга прекратить его кровавый поход.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_000070_ESTINIEN<tab>If there is to be a meeting, I would accompany you.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_000070_ESTINIEN<tab>Если у вас намечаются переговоры с драконами, я присоединяюсь.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_000080_ALPHINAUD<tab>...Estinien!?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_000080_ALPHINAUD<tab>...Эстиниен!?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_000090_ESTINIEN<tab>Even with your intermediary, Nidhogg's bloodrage may render him deaf to reason. However, the mere attempt may afford our forces precious time to prepare.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_000090_ESTINIEN<tab>Даже с вашей посредницей ярость Нидхогга вполне может сделать его глухим к доводам разума. Но попытка того стоит — по крайней мере даст нашим силам немного больше времени на подготовку.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_000100_ESTINIEN<tab>Of course...you might also consider a more direct approach to ending this conflict. With the power of the Eye at my disposal, and the vaunted strength of the Warrior of Light, we could conceivably slay the beast outright...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_000100_ESTINIEN<tab>Разумеется, можно будет рассмотреть и более... радикальный метод окончания этого конфликта. Со мной сила Ока, а вдобавок <var 08 E905 ((пресловутая Воительница)) ((пресловутый Воин)) /var> Света — мы будем способны уничтожить змия на месте.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_000110_ALPHINAUD<tab>If we are to risk a face-to-face meeting with the dread wyrm, I for one would feel safer in the company of the Azure Dragoon. However, I should only turn to your lance if my words failed to find their mark. Is that clear?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_000110_ALPHINAUD<tab>Встреча лицом к лицу с одним из древних змиев действительно огромный риск, и я буду чувствовать себя куда безопаснее в компании Лазурного Драгуна. Однако мы прибегнем к копью лишь в том случае, если мои слова не сработают — это понятно?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_000120_ESTINIEN<tab>Perfectly. I shall assume that Iceheart enjoys similar diplomatic protection until instructed otherwise.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_000120_ESTINIEN<tab>Более чем. Ручаюсь, я и Ледяное Сердце пальцем не трону до тех пор, пока мне не будет разрешено действовать.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_000130_ESTINIEN<tab>A word of advice: think carefully before divulging the particulars of this plan to Ser Aymeric. 'Twould not do to have the lord commander accused of consorting with heretics.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_000130_ESTINIEN<tab>Кстати, дружеский совет — подумайте хорошенько над тем, как будете излагать свой план сэру Эмерику. Не заставляйте бедолагу лорда-командующего лично обвинять вас в измене и сношениях с еретиками.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_000140_ALPHINAUD<tab>Indeed. I thank you for your counsel, Estinien. We shall be honored to have you with us.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_000140_ALPHINAUD<tab>Действительно. Спасибо за совет, Эстиниен. Будет приятно работать с вами.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_000150_ESTINIEN<tab>I am glad to be of service.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_000150_ESTINIEN<tab>Рад услужить.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_100010_AYMERIC<tab>I want the defenses of the outer ward rechecked. See to it that the ballistas are in good repair and supplied with enough ammunition for a prolonged siege.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_100010_AYMERIC<tab>Проверьте защиту внешнего устройства ещё раз. Убедитесь, что все баллисты в рабочем состоянии и каждая располагает достаточным количеством амуниции. Осада обещает быть затяжной.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_100020_YOUNGTEMPLEKNIGHT<tab>At once, my lord!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_100020_YOUNGTEMPLEKNIGHT<tab>Да, милорд!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_100030_AYMERIC<tab>Ah, 'twould seem I have visitors─and unlike those massing beyond our walls, these ones are welcome.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_100030_AYMERIC<tab>Так-так, похоже, у меня гости, и — в отличии от чешуйчатых гадов за стенами города — этим гостям я весьма рад.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_100040_ALPHINAUD<tab>Pray forgive us for interrupting you in the midst of your preparations, Ser Aymeric, but our suit concerns the impending assault. To speak plain, we believe there is a chance the invasion might be halted before it even begins.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_100040_ALPHINAUD<tab>Простите что отрываем вас от работы, сэр Эмерик, но наша просьба как раз касается грядущей атаки. Если говорить без обиняков, мы верим, что есть шанс предотвратить вторжение ещё до его начала.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_100050_ALPHINAUD<tab>I can divulge little more at this time, but I must nevertheless request that you advise the Holy See to refrain from launching any preemptive sorties whilst we seek to put our plans in motion.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_100050_ALPHINAUD<tab>Нам, конечно, придётся многое успеть за короткое время, но тем не менее я прошу вас убедить Святой Престол не начинать первыми — не устраивать никаких упреждающих ударов, покуда мы будем приводить наш план в действие.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_100060_AYMERIC<tab>I will gladly lend my support to any endeavor that could spare the blood of my countrymen─but I would know more of the cause you would have me champion. Will you not share aught of this mysterious undertaking?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_100060_AYMERIC<tab>Я с радостью поддержу вас с любой идеей, если она обещает избавить нас от кровопролития... Но мне бы хотелось знать об этом деле подробнее. Не поделитесь, что это за загадочный план?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_100070_ESTINIEN<tab>Know that I have offered my lance to aid in this endeavor. I cannot claim that its success is assured, but our actions should serve to delay Nidhogg's advance at the very least.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_100070_ESTINIEN<tab>Знайте, что я предложил этим господам своё копьё в данном начинании. Не знаю, будет ли путешествие успешным, но как минимум наши действия ненадолго отложат атаку Нидхогга.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_100080_ESTINIEN<tab>Which is more than can be said for the ill-conceived counterattack advocated by the See's more vocal crusaders. They offer glorious death, but little hope of victory.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_100080_ESTINIEN<tab>Так можете им и сказать — ведь, насколько мне известно, за превентивные удары голосуют особенно рьяные рыцари Святого Престола. Сами знаете — славная смерть, никаких надежд на победу...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_100090_AYMERIC<tab>Aye...their proposal does not inspire confidence. Our resources should rightly be spent shoring up the city's defenses.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_100090_AYMERIC<tab>Действительно... Их предложения не особенно вдохновляют. К тому же, хорошо бы наши ресурсы направить на усиление защиты города.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_100100_AYMERIC<tab>Hmmm. The Azure Dragoon and the Warrior of Light, sallying forth together to face the dread wyrm, Nidhogg...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_100100_AYMERIC<tab>Хм-м-м. Лазурный Драгун и Воин Света отправляются бросить вызов жуткому змию, Нидхоггу...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_100110_AYMERIC<tab>I must admit, the mere thought of it does much to dispel my misgivings. Go, then─carry out your plan. I shall do what I can for you within the Holy See.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_100110_AYMERIC<tab>Должен признать, сама по себе эта идея внушает некоторую уверенность. Ступайте же — действуйте по вашему плану. Я займусь вопросами, связанными со Святым Престолом.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_200010_THORDAN<tab>Such commotion...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_200010_THORDAN<tab>Опять переполох...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_200020_ZEPHIRIN<tab>Yes, Your Eminence. The bells of the Observatorium warn of our enemy's approach...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_200020_ZEPHIRIN<tab>Да, ваше сиятельство. Колокола Обсерватории гласят о приближении врага...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_200030_THORDAN<tab>So...the dragons are coming.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_200030_THORDAN<tab>Значит, драконы.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_200040_THORDAN<tab>Let them come─in their hundreds and their thousands. With the divine blade in our hands, we shall rend their flesh and drown the heretics in their masters' blood. Even Nidhogg and his foul brood shall be powerless to resist us.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_200040_THORDAN<tab>Пусть приходят, сотнями и тысячами. В наших руках будет божественный клинок, мы разделаемся с Ордой и утопим еретиков в крови их хозяев. Даже Нидхогг со своим проклятым племенем будет бессилен перед нами.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_200050_THORDAN<tab>And when we have rid the world of their pestilence, we shall turn our attention to our Ascian allies─see that they are suitably rewarded for their invaluable assistance.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_200050_THORDAN<tab>А когда мы избавим мир от их заразы, мы почтим наших асцианских друзей — нужно будет отплатить им сполна за их <var 1A 02 /var>бесценную<var 1A 01 /var> помощь.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_200060_ZEPHIRIN<tab>If I may, Your Eminence. The Paragons wield powers strange and unknowable. Can we be certain that they will not see through our deception?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_200060_ZEPHIRIN<tab>Позвольте, ваше сиятельство... Предвечные владеют силами странными и доселе невиданными. Можем ли мы быть уверены, что они не раскусят наш замысел?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_200070_THORDAN<tab>We can be certain of naught save the righteousness of our cause. If you would be a true leader of men, you must possess conviction as well as caution.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_200070_THORDAN<tab>Единственная вещь, в которой можно быть уверенными — это праведность наших действий. Настоящий лидер должен обладать непоколебимыми убеждениями, — но и осторожностью.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_200080_THORDAN<tab>We seek to excise the root of an evil that has blighted us for a thousand years. The risk is worth the reward.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_200080_THORDAN<tab>Мы собираемся вырвать корень зла, что отравляет нас вот уже тысячу лет. Риск того стоит.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_200090_ZEPHIRIN<tab>And what of Estinien and this Warrior of Light? They have plans of their own...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_200090_ZEPHIRIN<tab>А что Эстиниен и Воин Света? У них какой-то свой план...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_200100_THORDAN<tab>Leave them to their purpose. We must each play the role we have been given...you and your chosen brothers most of all.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_200100_THORDAN<tab>Пускай действуют. Каждому из нас уготована роль... Не забывай о своей — и о роли твоих избранных братьев.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_200110_ZEPHIRIN<tab>For the glory of King Thordan...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_200110_ZEPHIRIN<tab>Во славу короля Тордана...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_300010_ICEHEART<tab>(-Iceheart-)Ah, I should have known it would be you...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_300010_ICEHEART<tab>(-Ледяное Сердце-)Нужно было догадаться, что тут будете вы...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_300020_ICEHEART<tab>(-Iceheart-)Word reached me of a struggle with a small but well-armed band of trespassers. Forgive my comrades their hostility─few come here uninvited, and fewer still with good intent.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_300020_ICEHEART<tab>(-Ледяное Сердце-)До меня дошли сведения о сражении с маленькой, но отлично вооружённой компанией чужаков. Простите моим товарищам чрезмерную враждебность - мало кто здесь ходит, и гораздо меньше здесь людей с хорошими намерениями.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_300030_ICEHEART<tab>(-Iceheart-)Now, tell me why you are here.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_300030_ICEHEART<tab>(-Ледяное Сердце-)Теперь скажите, зачем вы здесь.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_Q1_000_1<tab>What will you say to Lady Iceheart?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_Q1_000_1<tab>Что вы ей ответите?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_A1_000_1<tab>We wish to stop Nidhogg's attack on Ishgard.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_A1_000_1<tab>Мы хотим предотвратить атаку на Ишгард.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_A1_000_2<tab>We wished to speak with you.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_A1_000_2<tab>Мы хотим с тобой поговорить.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_A1_000_3<tab>It's a long story...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_A1_000_3<tab>Это длинная история...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_300040_ICEHEART<tab>(-Iceheart-)So, you seek to stem the Dravanian tide with talk? A romantic notion.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_300040_ICEHEART<tab>(-Ледяное Сердце-)Собираетесь остановить драванский поток смешной плотинкой из разговоров? Звучит даже романтично.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_300050_ICEHEART<tab>(-Iceheart-)If you but knew the truth─the spark which lit the flames of this animosity─you would understand the futility of your quest.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_300050_ICEHEART<tab>(-Ледяное Сердце-)Если бы вы знали правду - ту искру, что зажгла наше восстание - то поняли бы бессмысленность вашего похода.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_300060_ICEHEART<tab>(-Iceheart-)Shall I relate it to you? The sordid history my gift has shown me? That which the Holy See has taken such pains to suppress?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_300060_ICEHEART<tab>(-Ледяное Сердце-)Хотите, расскажу? Грустную историю, которую я увидела благодаря своему дару? Ту самую, которую Святой Престол изо всех сил пытается скрыть?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_400010_ICEHEART<tab>(-Iceheart-)'Twas more than a millennium past when an Elezen tribe first sought to claim the lands of Coerthas as its home.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_400010_ICEHEART<tab>(-Ледяное Сердце-)Больше чем тысячелетие назад некое племя элезенов пришла на эти земли, дабы провозгласить Кёртас своим новым домом.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_400020_ICEHEART<tab>(-Iceheart-)Unfortunately for them, Coerthas was already home to dragonkind, and they were not inclined to make way for the invaders. Thus did a bloody war begin─a war which might well have rumbled on until one or the other side was exterminated, had it not been for the resolve of a single woman. That woman's name was “Shiva.”
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_400020_ICEHEART<tab>(-Ледяное Сердце-)И представьте себе их разочарование, когда Кёртас уже оказался населён другим народом - драконами, что не особенно были рады пришельцам. И вот, началась кровавая война - такая, что вполне могла бушевать до тех пор, пока одна из сторон не была бы полностью истреблена. Так бы и случилось, если бы не решимость одной-единственной женщины. Её звали Шива.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_400030_ICEHEART<tab>(-Iceheart-)While those around her fought and died, she attempted to parley with the dragons, and in so doing discovered them to be possessed of profound intelligence and reason. The great wyrm Hraesvelgr in particular so enchanted Shiva that she found herself growing to love the creature, whom her people considered a monster.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_400030_ICEHEART<tab>(-Ледяное Сердце-)Пока вокруг неё сражались и умирали, она попыталась пойти на контакт с драконами, в результате чего выяснила, что они мыслящие существа - с немалым к тому же интеллектом. Хресвельг, великий змий, в особенности ей понравился - она обнаружила, что в её груди растёт любовь к существу, которое её народ назвал бы монстром.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_400040_ICEHEART<tab>(-Iceheart-)In the eyes of a near-immortal dragon, however, the fleeting life of an Elezen is as that of a freshly cut rose─scarce has the flower bloomed before it begins to fade and wither.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_400040_ICEHEART<tab>(-Ледяное Сердце-)Но в глазах бессмертного дракона жизнь элезенки была мимолётна; словно свежесорванная роза - цветок, что сегодня цветёт, завтра угаснет и погибнет.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_400050_ICEHEART<tab>(-Iceheart-)Such melancholy musings plagued Hraesvelgr, who had found in Shiva an unexpected and beloved soulmate. He knew that all too soon, death would snatch her away from him.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_400050_ICEHEART<tab>(-Ледяное Сердце-)Такие меланхоличные мысли завладели Хресвельгом, который тоже относился к Шиве, как к неожиданной и возлюбленной партии. Он знал, что совсем скоро смерть отберёт её у него.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_400060_ICEHEART<tab>(-Iceheart-)Unable to bear the thought of their separation, the maid bid the wyrm consume her, that their spirits might be entwined for eternity.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_400060_ICEHEART<tab>(-Ледяное Сердце-)Не в силах вынести мысль о расставании, девушка попросила змия поглотить её - дабы их души сплелись на веки вечные.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_400070_ICEHEART<tab>(-Iceheart-)...Though loath to perform the deed, Hraesvelgr ultimately gave in to her plea, and soon thereafter, the tale of their ill-fated love spread throughout the two warring factions. No more could they raise blade or claw against one another, knowing that the souls of their kin were so inextricably bound.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_400070_ICEHEART<tab>(-Ледяное Сердце-)...Сперва Хресвельг сомневался, но затем всё таки совершил предложенное; совсем скоро история об их несчастной любви облетела обе воюющие стороны. Больше не могли они поднять друг на друга меч или коготь зная, что души их народов были связаны таким необыкновенным образом.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_400080_ICEHEART<tab>(-Iceheart-)In the days that followed, man and dragon learned to live in harmony, and together built a nation unlike any the world had ever known. For two hundred years did this blissful age of peace continue, as it would to this day, had vilest envy not stirred in the hearts of the Elezen.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_400080_ICEHEART<tab>(-Ледяное Сердце-)В последующие дни люди и драконы жили в гармонии. Они вместе строили нацию, непохожую ни на одну другую. Почти две сотни лет продолжался благословенный мир - пока самоё тёмное чувство зависти не всколыхнуло сердца элезенов.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_400090_ICEHEART<tab>(-Iceheart-)It is said that wyrms owe their longevity to the boundless reserves of vitality found within their eyes─and 'twas in this belief that a traitorous band of knights deceived their allies of some two centuries, and took by force that which they coveted...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_400090_ICEHEART<tab>(-Ледяное Сердце-)Сказано, что своим долголетием и силой драконы обязаны своим глазам - это было известно и группе рыцарей-отступников, что предали своих двухсотлетних союзников. Они взяли то, чего жаждали, силой...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_500010_ICEHEART<tab>(-Iceheart-)Nidhogg─he who now stands poised to unleash his wyrmlings upon Ishgard─was the great dragon who lost an eye to Elezen treachery.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_500010_ICEHEART<tab>(-Iceheart-)(-Ледяное Сердце-)Нидхогг - тот, кто отправляет полчища своих детей на Ишгард - тот самый великий дракон, что потерял глаз из-за предательства элезенов.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_500020_ICEHEART<tab>(-Iceheart-)And until he prises it from the hands of the traitors' progeny, no amount of conciliatory words will stay his fury.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_500020_ICEHEART<tab>(-Ледяное Сердце-)И до тех пор, пока он не получит своё Око из рук потомков предателей, никакие слова или уговоры не подействуют и не охладят его ярость.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_500030_ESTINIEN<tab>You are wrong, Lady Iceheart.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_500030_ESTINIEN<tab>Ты не права, леди Ледяное Сердце.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_500040_ESTINIEN<tab>Lest you misunderstand, I do not doubt your vision of the past─'tis true that Nidhogg greatly desired to reclaim the Eye.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_500040_ESTINIEN<tab>Чтоб ты понимала, я не ставлю под сомнение твои видения прошлого - известно, что Нидхогг больше всего мечтает заполучить обратно своё Око.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_500050_ESTINIEN<tab>Indeed, it was for that very reason that I kept it with me as I roamed the land, attempting to draw him away from the city.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_500050_ESTINIEN<tab>Действительно, как раз по этой причине я носил его с собой во время недавних странствий, с намерением отвлечь его от города.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_500060_ALPHINAUD<tab>Good gods...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_500060_ALPHINAUD<tab>Милостивые боги...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_500070_ESTINIEN<tab>Until recently, Nidhogg seemed unable to resist its allure, and pursued me relentlessly. Needless to say, that is no longer the case. Now, it would seem he has fixed his attention on Ishgard itself, though he knows full well the Eye does not reside there.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_500070_ESTINIEN<tab>До недавних пор Нидхогг, вроде бы, не мог сопротивляться влечению, а поэтому неотступно меня преследовал. Как я уже сказал - до недавних пор. Сейчас он целиком и полностью сосредоточен на Ишгарде, хотя ему отлично известно, что Ока там нет.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_500080_ICEHEART<tab>(-Iceheart-)You believe he targets the capital for another reason...?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_500080_ICEHEART<tab>(-Ледяное Сердце-)Значит, он атакует столицу по какой-то другой причине?..

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_500090_ESTINIEN<tab>I believe reason has all but left him. Through the Eye, I feel much of what Nidhogg feels, and the dragon's thirst for vengeance will not be quenched by aught less than a sea of blood.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_500090_ESTINIEN<tab>Боюсь, понимание причин и следствий уже ускользнуло от него. Благодаря Оку я чувствую то же, что и Нидхогг - жажда крови свела с ума этого дракона, он не остановится, пока не зальёт ею весь город.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_500100_ALPHINAUD<tab>If Nidhogg is indeed lost to reason, might we not seek an audience with Hraesvelgr instead?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_500100_ALPHINAUD<tab>Если с разумом Нидхогга всё настолько плохо, может попросим аудиенции у Хресвельга?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_500110_ALPHINAUD<tab>He has thus far shown no inclination to aid in the invasion of Ishgard, and may yet welcome our efforts to broker a peace.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_500110_ALPHINAUD<tab>Пока что он со своей стаей не помогал брату в атаках Ишгарда, и вполне может принять наши идеи по заключению мира.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_500120_ICEHEART<tab>(-Iceheart-)You <var 1A 02 /var>still<var 1A 01 /var> believe that a peaceable solution can be found? Very well. I will take you to him.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_500120_ICEHEART<tab>(-Ледяное Сердце-)Так вы всё ещё верите, что может быть найдено мирное решение? Прекрасно. Я отведу вас к нему.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_500130_ICEHEART<tab>(-Iceheart-)Our road will lead us to Dravania, the homeland of dragonkind. There we shall ascend unto the clouds, where Hraesvelgr resides...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_500130_ICEHEART<tab>(-Ледяное Сердце-)Наш путь лежит в Драванию, родную землю драконов. Там мы поднимемся в облака, где обитает Хресвельг...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_600010_ALPHINAUD<tab>Is aught amiss, my friend?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_600010_ALPHINAUD<tab>Что-то не так, дружище?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_600020_ALPHINAUD<tab>I sense the many battles are beginning to take their toll. Rest awhile. And should you lose sight of us─Dravania lies beyond the mountains to the west.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_600020_ALPHINAUD<tab>Вижу, столько битв и страданий не прошли для тебя бесследно. Отдохни. Если вдруг потеряешь нас, знай - мы будем идти всё время на запад. Земли драконов лежат за горами.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_600030_MIDGARDSORMR<tab>Curious... The vestiges of thy mistress's blessing are not as faint as once they were...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_600030_MIDGARDSORMR<tab>Любопытно... Отзвук благословения твоей госпожи стал немного сильнее...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_600040_MIDGARDSORMR<tab>Thy will to succeed grants thee unusual fortitude. But will it be enough...?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_600040_MIDGARDSORMR<tab>Твоя воля к победе даёт тебе необыкновенную стойкость. Но будет ли этого достаточно?..

source:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_700010_EDMONT<tab>Beyond Abalathia's Spine─the great mountain range
that spans the continent of Aldenard from east to west...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_700010_EDMONT<tab>За Хребтом Абалатии - огромной горной грядой, 
что разделяет Алденард с востока на запад...

source:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_700020_EDMONT<tab>Into the deepening shadows of Sohm Al,
where lies the ancient home of dragonkind...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_700020_EDMONT<tab>В мрачные тени Сог Ала, древней родины драконов...

source:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_700030_EDMONT<tab>To a land where the soil slithers, and the skies seethe
with sinuous shapes, they came.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_700030_EDMONT<tab>В земли, где земля уходит из под ног, а облака в небесах принимают причудливые формы, лежал их путь.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_800010_ICEHEART<tab>Vidofnir!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_800010_ICEHEART<tab>Видофнир!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_800020_VIDOFNIR<tab>Ah, 'tis thee, Little One. From above, I did mistake thee for a Gnath. 'Tis well I chanced to look again, or thou wouldst now be ash.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_800020_VIDOFNIR<tab>А, это ты, малышка. Отсюда я чуть не перепутала тебя с гнатом. Хорошо, что я пригляделась, не то быть тебе ныне горсткою пепла.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_800030_ICEHEART<tab>Dear Vidofnir...how I have missed you. Would that I had come sooner...and not out of dire necessity.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_800030_ICEHEART<tab>Милая Видофнир... Я так скучала! Хотелось бы мне прийти раньше... и без срочной необходимости.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_800040_VIDOFNIR<tab>Thou art troubled. Speak, that I might know thy plight.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_800040_VIDOFNIR<tab>Что с тобой? Говори, дабы я узнала причину твоего беспокойства.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_800050_VIDOFNIR<tab>Thou wouldst have Father admonish his brood-brother?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_800050_VIDOFNIR<tab>Хочешь, чтобы отец охладил пыл своего брата?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_800060_ICEHEART<tab>I would end this war without further bloodshed.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_800060_ICEHEART<tab>Я закончу эту войну без дальнейшего кровопролития.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_800070_VIDOFNIR<tab>How am I to believe thee, Little One...when thine own companion beareth Nidhogg's stolen eye!?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_800070_VIDOFNIR<tab>И как мне тебе поверить, малышка... когда твой защитник несёт украденную силу Ока Нидхогга!?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_800080_ESTINIEN<tab>Have care, dragon...or I shall gouge out one of yours.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_800080_ESTINIEN<tab>Осторожнее, дракон, пока я не вырвал одно из твоих.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_800090_ICEHEART<tab>You forget yourself, ser! We are here on a mission of peace!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_800090_ICEHEART<tab>Вы забываетесь, сэр! У нас тут мирная миссия!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_800100_VIDOFNIR<tab>My sire's will forbiddeth me from inviting discord to our home... 'Tis for this reason, and no other, that thou still drawest breath, knight.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_800100_VIDOFNIR<tab>Мой родитель запретил мне устраивать хаос в нашем доме... По этой причине - и лишь по этой - ты ещё дышишь, рыцарь.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_800110_ICEHEART<tab>Vidofnir, please─we must be allowed to convey our intentions to Hraesvelgr in person, with words of our own choosing.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_800110_ICEHEART<tab>Видофнир, прошу - мы должны изложить наше дело Хресвельгу с глазу на глаз, тем словами, которые посчитаем нужным.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_800120_ICEHEART<tab>Grant us this favor, and open the way to Sohm Al!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_800120_ICEHEART<tab>Сделай для нас это одолжение. Открой путь в Сог Ал!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_800130_VIDOFNIR<tab>Thou hast ever been welcome, Little One.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_800130_VIDOFNIR<tab>Я была бы рада помочь, малышка.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_800140_VIDOFNIR<tab>...But I cannot grant thy wish. I am bound to remain here, and protect my kin from the Gnath's god.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_800140_VIDOFNIR<tab>...Но не сейчас. Я обязана оставаться здесь, защищать мой народ от бога гнатов.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_800150_ICEHEART<tab>The Gnath have summoned a primal!?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_800150_ICEHEART<tab>Гнаты призвали праймала!?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_800160_ALPHINAUD<tab>Pray excuse my forwardness, but if we were to eliminate the threat to your territory, would you consent to Lady Ysayle's request?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_800160_ALPHINAUD<tab>Простите, что влезаю, но если бы мы устранили эту угрозу на вашей территории, исполнили бы вы просьбу леди Исель?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_800170_VIDOFNIR<tab>Ha! Dost thou imagine thyself equal to the task─to succeed where dragons have failed?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_800170_VIDOFNIR<tab>Ха! Ты что, воображаешь себя способным справиться с задачей? Добиться успеха там, где драконы терпели неудачу?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_800180_VIDOFNIR<tab>'Tis beyond thee, mortal. But thou art welcome to try, nonetheless. Only know that idle promises shall avail thee naught!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_800180_VIDOFNIR<tab>Это выше твоих сил, смертный. Можешь, конечно, попробовать. Но знай, пустые обещания я слушать не стану!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_800190_ICEHEART<tab>It would seem we have no choice but to make good on Alphinaud's offer. Why must our every bid for peace breed yet more war?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_800190_ICEHEART<tab>Похоже, у нас нет другого выбора, кроме как исполнить предложение Альфино. Почему каждый наш шаг в достижении мира должен вызывать всё новые и новые сражения?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_810010_ICEHEART<tab>Now we have but to wait...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_810010_ICEHEART<tab>Теперь подождём...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_810020_GNATHPRIEST<tab>O Lord Ravana! Master of the Sacred Blades! Wrath of the Colony! Conqueror of the World! Hear our prayer!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_810020_GNATHPRIEST<tab>Повелитель Равана! Мастер Тайного Клинка! Гнев колонии! Завоеватель мира! Услышь наши мольбы!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_810030_GNATHPRIEST<tab>Pray grant unto Your devoted children the gift of Your divine presence!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_810030_GNATHPRIEST<tab>Молим Тебя, явись Твоим преданным детям в своём божественном обличии!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_810040_ICEHEART<tab>He comes!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_810040_ICEHEART<tab>Вот и он!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_810050_RAVANA<tab>All strength to the colony. Speak and I shall listen!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_810050_RAVANA<tab>Да славится колония. Говорите, и я выслушаю вас!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_810060_GNATHPRIEST<tab>O Glorious General! We have captured intruders, and would make unto You an offering of their life's blood...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_810060_GNATHPRIEST<tab>О, славный воевода! Мы захватили чужаков и хотим сделать Вам подношение в виде их крови...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_810070_RAVANA<tab>These feeble fleshlings dared to invade Gnath lands?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_810070_RAVANA<tab>Эти жалкие кожаные мешки посмели вторгаться в земли гнатов?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_810080_ICEHEART<tab>Hear me, Lord Ravana! My companion and I did not come to contest your children's territory.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_810080_ICEHEART<tab>Услышь, повелитель Равана! Мой товарищ и я пришли не для того, чтобы отбирать у твоих детей территорию.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_810090_ICEHEART<tab>We wished only to learn the reason you wage war against the dragons.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_810090_ICEHEART<tab>Мы желали лишь узнать причину, по которой вы начали войну против драконов.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_810100_RAVANA<tab>Thou wouldst flirt with death merely to satisfy thy curiosity? Wherefore should the glorious conquests of the Gnath concern thee so, Elezen?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_810100_RAVANA<tab>Заигрывать со смертью лишь для того, чтобы удовлетворить любопытство? И вообще, славные завоевания гнатов тебя не касаются, элезенка!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_810110_RAVANA<tab>...Ahhh, mayhap thine own kind's struggle against the wyrms fareth poorly, and thou art desirous of a pact.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_810110_RAVANA<tab>...А, понял - твой род тоже страдает от змиев, но силёнок у вас не хватает - а потому ты пришла договориться о помощи.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_810120_ICEHEART<tab>We crave no alliance, Lord Ravana─only peace. We would bring an end to our war with the dragons. Yet so long as they remain embroiled in this conflict with your children, our goal shall remain out of reach.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_810120_ICEHEART<tab>Мы не союза с тобой ищем, повелитель Равана, а лишь заключить мир. Мы собираемся закончить нашу войну с драконами. Но пока ты со своими детьми нагнетаешь конфликт, наша цель для нас остаётся недостижимой.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_810130_ICEHEART<tab>Never before have the Gnath risen up in such numbers, and never yet with you at their head. Why do you lead them to war?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_810130_ICEHEART<tab>До этих пор гнаты никогда не восставали таким числом, и никогда ещё с тобой во главе. Зачем ты ведёшь их воевать?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_810140_RAVANA<tab>Thy question hath no meaning. To live is but to fight.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_810140_RAVANA<tab>Твой вопрос не имеет смысла. Жить - означает сражаться.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_810150_RAVANA<tab>Long have my children waited, gathering their strength in the shadow of thy ceaseless conflict.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_810150_RAVANA<tab>Долго ждали мои дети, медленно собираясь с силами в тени вашего бесконечного конфликта.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_810160_RAVANA<tab>The Gnath would see the Dravanians slain, and their territory secured─and by such fervent prayers am I now given form and purpose.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_810160_RAVANA<tab>Гнаты мечтают изничтожить драванцев и захватить их территории - такими горячими молитвами я создан, такое желание дало мне форму и цель.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_810170_ICEHEART<tab>As I feared, your very existence is an obstacle to our goal. Since you are so fond of fighting, we challenge you, Lord of the Gnath!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_810170_ICEHEART<tab>Как я и боялась, само твоё существование мешает нам достичь цели. Если тебе так нравится сражаться, мы вызываем тебя на бой, повелитель гнатов!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_810180_ICEHEART<tab>And should we emerge the victors, I would have you swear to withdraw your soldiers from Dravanian soil!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_810180_ICEHEART<tab>Если мы тебя одолеем, ты поклянёшься, что уведёшь своих солдатов с драванской земли!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_810190_RAVANA<tab>Gahahaha! Thou art bold indeed to risk thy fleshy hide so readily!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_810190_RAVANA<tab>Пха-ха-ха-ха-ха! Ты так торопишься рискнуть своей беззащитной кожей?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_810200_RAVANA<tab>Very well. I, Ravana, fourfold master of the blade, do accept thy challenge!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_810200_RAVANA<tab>Да будет так. Я, Равана, четверорукий мастер клинка, принимаю твой вызов!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_810210_RAVANA<tab>But should <var 1A 02 /var>I<var 1A 01 /var> emerge the victor, I would have thee swear to serve in mine army till thy last breath is spent! Do you accept!?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_810210_RAVANA<tab>Но если <var 1A 02 /var>я<var 1A 01 /var> выйду победителем, вы поклянётесь служить в моей армии на веки вечные, пока смерть не заберёт вас! Согласны!?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_810220_ICEHEART<tab>I do! And I believe the first bout is mine!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_810220_ICEHEART<tab>Согласна! И, надо полагать, первый раунд мой!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_810230_RAVANA<tab>What is this!? A god clad in flesh!?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_810230_RAVANA<tab>Что это!? Бог в теле смертного!?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_810240_ICEHEART<tab>Is aught amiss, my lord? Thou wilt not break thy word, I trust.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_810240_ICEHEART<tab>Что-то не так, повелитель? Надеюсь, ты не нарушишь слова.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_810250_RAVANA<tab>Mine oath is unbending as steel, little goddess! Thy ruse will but add to mine enjoyment!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_810250_RAVANA<tab>Моя клятва - сталь, маленькая богиня. Я повергну тебя, и это будет упоительно!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_810260_ICEHEART<tab>I thought myself...stronger... Mayhap with more crystals...?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_810260_ICEHEART<tab>Я думала, что... сильнее... Возможно, если бы было больше кристаллов?..

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_810270_RAVANA<tab>Be thou god or maid, thou art nothing to me! ...And what of thee, mortal? Art thou warrior or craven?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_810270_RAVANA<tab>Богиня ты или дева, для меня ты ничто! ...А что ты, смертное создание? Ты воин или жалкая крыса?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_810280_RAVANA<tab>A warrior, then! Good! Mayhap thou wilt provide more sport than thy feeble companion!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_810280_RAVANA<tab>Значит, воин! Хорошо! Надеюсь с тобой будет веселее, чем с твоей хрупкой подружкой!

source:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_820010_RAVANA<tab>Thus doth the sacred rite of combat proclaim the victor...
I lay my blades at thy feet, child of man...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_820010_RAVANA<tab>В священном ритуале битвы определён победитель...
Я возлагаю свои клинки к твоим ногам, дитя человеческое...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_820020_ICEHEART<tab>You do not disappoint, Warrior of Light. Would that I had your skill in battle. ...I do begin to see why so many place their faith in you.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_820020_ICEHEART<tab>Ты не разочаровываешь, Воин Света. Мне бы твои силы в бою... Начинаю понимать, почему все в тебя так верят.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_820030_ICEHEART<tab>For all his savagery, I do not think Ravana one to break his word. Provided the dragons do not trespass upon Gnath lands, they should have little to fear of the primal's biting blades. We have done well, have we not? Come, let us return to Vidofnir and share these glad tidings.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_820030_ICEHEART<tab>Невзирая на всю его дикость, полагаю, Равана не нарушит слова. Если драконы не станут угрожать землям гнатов, им нечего боятся клинков праймала. Мы отлично справились, разве нет? Пойдём. Вернёмся к Видофнир и сообщим хорошие новости.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_820040_IGEYOHRM<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>Once more you achieve the impossible, Bringer of Light... But with every mortal heart that succumbs to fear and fury, another voice is joined to the chorus beseeching divine succor.<var 48 01 /var>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_820040_IGEYOHRM<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>И снова тебе удаётся совершить невозможное, Воин Света... Но каждое смертное сердце, что поддаётся страху и ярости, добавляет свой голос в хор божественного спасения.<var 48 01 /var>

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_820050_IGEYOHRM<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>At their bidding, warring gods will shake the firmament, and your world will be consumed in the swelling storm of chaos...<var 48 01 /var>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_820050_IGEYOHRM<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>Их стараниями призванные боги разрушат сами основы твоего мира, и он утонет в пучине хаоса...<var 48 01 /var>

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_900010_EDMONT<tab>To the peak of Sohm Al, at the end of a perilous mountain path...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_900010_EDMONT<tab>На вершину Сог Ала, в завершении трудного горного подъёма...

source:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_900020_EDMONT<tab>Whence could be seen a string of pearl-like islands,
floating impossibly atop a sea of clouds.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_900020_EDMONT<tab>Где жемчужными островами протянулись земли,
словно бы плывущие в бескрайнем море из облаков...

source:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_900030_EDMONT<tab>To a domain where dragons and men had once lived in harmony, whose majesty
no mortal eye had glimpsed for nigh on a thousand years, they came.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_900030_EDMONT<tab>В земли, где драконы и люди однажды жили в мире, чьё великолепие
тысячу лет оставалось скрыто для смертных взоров, лежал их путь.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_A00010_HRAESVELGR<tab>Mortals... Why do you disturb my solitude?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_A00010_HRAESVELGR<tab>Смертные... Зачем вы тревожите мой покой?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_A00020_ALPHINAUD<tab>Hraesvelgr...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_A00020_ALPHINAUD<tab>Хресвельг...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_A00030_HRAESVELGR<tab>Thou speakest the name of a creature that but awaiteth the release of oblivion. Leave me...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_A00030_HRAESVELGR<tab>Вы позвали того, кто лишь жаждет освобождения в небытии. Оставьте меня...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_A00031_ALPHINAUD<tab>By the Twelve... Mine ears hear the tongue of dragons, yet the meaning rings clear within my mind... How can that be...?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_A00031_ALPHINAUD<tab>Клянусь Двенадцатью... Мои уши слышат язык драконов, но их значение явственно звучит внутри меня... Как такое возможно?..

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_A00040_ICEHEART<tab>Hraesvelgr...do you not remember me? 'Twas I whom you found in Dravania─I who glimpsed the truth.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_A00040_ICEHEART<tab>Хресвельг... ты не помнишь меня? Я та, кого ты тогда отыскал в Дравании - та, что узрела частицу правды.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_A00050_ICEHEART<tab>The truth about your past, about Shiva─
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_A00050_ICEHEART<tab>Часть истории о твоём прошлом, о Шиве...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_A00060_HRAESVELGR<tab>Do not speak her name, mortal!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_A00060_HRAESVELGR<tab>Не смей произносить её имя, смертная!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_A00070_ICEHEART<tab>But speak it I must! I have summoned Shiva's soul from the beyond, and offered myself as her vessel! She has made her heart known to me!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_A00070_ICEHEART<tab>Но я должна! Я призвала душу Шивы с Той стороны, и предложила ей своё тело в качестве сосуда! Она открыла мне своё сердце и душу!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_A00080_HRAESVELGR<tab>Foolish girl. Thinkest thou my beloved's spirit hath descended from the heavens!?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_A00080_HRAESVELGR<tab>Глупая девчонка. Думаешь, дух моей возлюбленной спустился с небес!?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_A00090_HRAESVELGR<tab>That the secrets of her heart are thine to know!?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_A00090_HRAESVELGR<tab>Думаешь, секреты её души теперь твои!?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_A00100_ICEHEART<tab>I have surrendered mine to her! Do you not see, my love? I am Shiva reborn!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_A00100_ICEHEART<tab>Я отдала себя ей! Ты что, не видишь, любовь моя? Я возрождённая Шива!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_A00110_HRAESVELGR<tab>Gullible fool... The Light but illuminated the past for thee, it did not grant thee omniscience.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_A00110_HRAESVELGR<tab>Легковерная дурочка... Твоё прошлое освещено Светом, но ты блуждаешь во тьме.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_A00120_HRAESVELGR<tab>The spirit thou hast summoned belongeth not to Shiva─'tis but a shade conjured by thine own fancy.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_A00120_HRAESVELGR<tab>Дух, который ты призвала, никакая не Шива - это лишь иллюзия, сотворённая твоим собственным воображением.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_A00130_HRAESVELGR<tab>In an age long past, mine own kin were guilty of like folly. Beguiled by the dark ones' lies, they attempted to resurrect a king amongst wyrms─yet the divinity they called forth merely borrowed the semblance of my fallen brood-brother.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_A00130_HRAESVELGR<tab>Наш род тоже провинился в подобном. В далёком прошлом, прислушавшись ко лжи Тёмных, они попытались воскресить короля змиев - но существо, которое они призвали, и близко не было нашим павшим собратом.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_A00140_HRAESVELGR<tab>Such gods are not summoned, but created. Phantoms spun from the threads of misplaced faith.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_A00140_HRAESVELGR<tab>Эти боги не призываются, они рукотворны. Призраки, сотканные из нитей лживой веры.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_A00150_ICEHEART<tab>Then the spirit that answered me...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_A00150_ICEHEART<tab>Значит дух, что мне ответил...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_A00160_HRAESVELGR<tab>...Was but thy dream of Shiva. Thy soul hath been corrupted by a deity of thine own making, child.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_A00160_HRAESVELGR<tab>...Это было лишь твоё представление о Шиве. Ты извратила свою душу божеством, которое сама же и создала, дитя.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_A00170_ALPHINAUD<tab>Be that as it may, Lord Hraesvelgr, Ysayle's desire to heal the rift between man and dragon is real, and it has borne us this far.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_A00170_ALPHINAUD<tab>Пусть так, владыка Хресвельг, но желание Исель избавиться от пропасти между людьми и драконами реально. Вот почему мы здесь.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_A00180_ALPHINAUD<tab>We would spare both our kind and yours the ravages of this senseless war! Pray join your voice to ours in a call for peace and forgiveness!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_A00180_ALPHINAUD<tab>Мы хотим избавить оба наших народа от ужасов этой бессмысленной войны! Встаньте на нашу сторону, призвав к миру и прощению!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_A00190_HRAESVELGR<tab>The tale of thy kind is one of avarice, treachery, and death─and thou wouldst speak to me of peace?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_A00190_HRAESVELGR<tab>Это история вашего народа полна жадности, предательства и смерти - и ты смеешь говорить мне о мире?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_A00200_HRAESVELGR<tab>Hark thee, mortal, to the naked truth...then tell me thou deservest forgiveness!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_A00200_HRAESVELGR<tab>Услышь, смертный, неприглядную правду... а потом решай, достойны ли вы прощения!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_B00010_HRAESVELGR<tab>Twelve hundred years ago, my beloved Shiva's sacrifice served to bring an end to the war 'twixt man and dragon, paving the way for an age of peace and cooperation.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_B00010_HRAESVELGR<tab>Двенадцать сотен лет назад жертва моей возлюбленной, Шивы, послужила знамением для окончания войны между людьми и драконами, обозначив начало эры мира и сотрудничества.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_B00020_HRAESVELGR<tab>Two centuries of harmony were to follow, during which time the Elezen learned much about us, not least that the eyes of a great wyrm are the wellspring of his strength.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_B00020_HRAESVELGR<tab>Два столетия царила гармония, и за это время элезены многое о нас узнали - в том числе и о том, что глаза великого змия являются источником его силы.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_B00030_HRAESVELGR<tab>'Twas out of the selfish desire to possess this strength that King Thordan then conspired to undo all that our peoples had achieved together.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_B00030_HRAESVELGR<tab>Мечтая обладать такой силой, король Тордан замыслил перечеркнуть всё то, чего наши народы добились вместе.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_B00040_HRAESVELGR<tab>With the aid of his leal knights, that most noble of Elezen lured my brood-sister Ratatoskr into an ambush, and took from her that which he craved.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_B00040_HRAESVELGR<tab>Вместе со своими верными рыцарями самый благовоспитанный элезен заманил мою родную сестру, Рататоскр, в засаду, а затем отнял у неё то, чего он так желал.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_B00050_HRAESVELGR<tab>Fain would I strike the image from my mind, yet still the scene doth linger─of my brood-sister's tattered corpse, defiled by her Elezen allies. They had torn out her eyes, and feasted upon them in the manner of wild beasts.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_B00050_HRAESVELGR<tab>Хотелось бы мне стереть увиденное мною в тот день, но сцена эта всё не уходит из моей памяти - изуродованное тело моей сестры, осквернённое её друзьями, элезенами. Они вырвали её глаза и, словно дикие звери, попытались сожрать их.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_B00060_HRAESVELGR<tab>Yet that was not all, for from their bloody banquet, the fiends had gained strength beyond that of mortal men... Even now, I labor to comprehend the enormity of their betrayal.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_B00060_HRAESVELGR<tab>Но это было лишь началом, ведь после своего кровавого банкета эти чудовища получили могущество, превосходящее силы любого смертного... По сей день я не могу охватить всего невероятия их безумного предательства.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_B00070_HRAESVELGR<tab>Nidhogg was the first to learn of the atrocity, and he took to the skies, hungry for vengeance.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_B00070_HRAESVELGR<tab>Нидхогг был первым, кто узнал об этом зверстве, и он поднялся в небеса в стремлении отомстить.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_B00080_HRAESVELGR<tab>But though he slew Thordan and some few of his knights, their fellow butchers knew only too well where to aim their spears, and with now-practiced savagery, they set about my brood-brother, sending him flailing from the field...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_B00080_HRAESVELGR<tab>Ему удалось убить Тордана и нескольких его рыцарей, но мясники слишком хорошо знали, куда целиться копьями, и при помощи обретённой дикой силы им удалось прогнать моего брата, заставив его, окровавленного, бежать с поля боя...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_B00090_HRAESVELGR<tab>Such is the truth the Holy See would keep hidden. Such was the beginning of the Dragonsong War.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_B00090_HRAESVELGR<tab>Такова истина, которую скрывает Святой Престол. Так началась Война Драконьей Песни.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_B00100_HRAESVELGR<tab>'Tis a song my kind shall ne'er forget, e'en should ten thousand years pass and Ishgard crumble into dust.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_B00100_HRAESVELGR<tab>Мой народ не забудет произошедшее, даже если пройдут десятки тысяч лет, а Ишгард рассыплется в пыль.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_C00010_ESTINIEN<tab>Your tale bears scant resemblance to the one I was taught. How convenient that it should absolve your kind of all responsibility. But tell me, dragon: why should I believe your version of events?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_C00010_ESTINIEN<tab>Твоя версия произошедшего слабо сходится с нашей. Конечно, Святой Престол попытался свалить вину за всё произошедшее на вас. Но скажи мне, змий: почему я должен верить тебе?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_C00020_HRAESVELGR<tab>What thou choosest to believe is immaterial. The betrayal that yet haunts mine every waking moment is no less than the truth to my kind.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_C00020_HRAESVELGR<tab>Вера - это вопрос выбора. Предательство, что преследует меня каждую минуту жизни - такая же истина, как и для остальных драконов.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_C00030_HRAESVELGR<tab>And Nidhogg meaneth for Thordan's people to suffer for this sin till the end of days.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_C00030_HRAESVELGR<tab>А Нидхогг желает, чтобы народ Тордана вечно страдал за свои грехи.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_C00040_HRAESVELGR<tab>That which thou imaginest a war of extinction is but a punishment─a siege of the spirit. Hast thou not seen those who tire of the torment? Those who abandon their own and side with dragonkind?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_C00040_HRAESVELGR<tab>Вы вообразили себе войну на выживание - не вы, но ваш разум заперт в стенах. Неужто ты не видел тех, кто устал от этого истязания? Тех, кто оставил своих и встал на сторону драконов?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_C00050_ALPHINAUD<tab>Ishgard's so-called heretics...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_C00050_ALPHINAUD<tab>Еретики, как их называют в Ишгарде...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_C00060_HRAESVELGR<tab>Know that all the traitors' progeny bear a trace of Ratatoskr's essence. But a single sip of our blood is enough to awaken it...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_C00060_HRAESVELGR<tab>Знайте же, что потомство предателей всё ещё несёт в себе отзвук эссенции Рататоскр. Один глоток нашей крови - и сила в вас пробудится.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_C00070_ICEHEART<tab>Then...the seed lies within us...?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_C00070_ICEHEART<tab>Значит... семя внутри нас?..

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_C00080_HRAESVELGR<tab>'Tis for this reason that those who abandon their loyalties are rewarded with a drink. And thus are they transformed, to join the ranks of Nidhogg's ever-growing army as newborn dragons. One by one, through death or defection, my brood-brother shall account for all of the betrayers' children...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_C00080_HRAESVELGR<tab>По этой причине те, кто оставил ваших хозяев, вознаграждаются таким питьём. Так они трансформируются, дабы присоединиться к рядам постоянно растущей армии Нидхогга - армии молодых драконов. Один за другим, смертью либо отсеиванием, мой брат избавится от всех детей предателя...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_C00090_ALPHINAUD<tab>Ye gods... I have borne witness to such a transformation! Looked on as a heretic assumed the shape of a dragon... I imagined it some manner of Dravanian enchantment!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_C00090_ALPHINAUD<tab>Боги... Мне уже доводилось видеть такую трансформацию! Я видел еретика, принявшего форму дракона... Я подумал, это какая-то хитроумная драванская иллюзия!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_C00100_ALPHINAUD<tab>But if any Ishgardian, regardless of allegiance, has such potential within them... Twelve forgive us. To think of all the dragons we've slain...!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_C00100_ALPHINAUD<tab>Но если каждый ишгардец, вне зависимости от его убеждений, способен на такое... Двенадцать помилуйте нас. Все те драконы, которых мы убили!..

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_C00110_HRAESVELGR<tab>There will always be some, of course, who choose to fight until the bitter end─like thee, dragoon...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_C00110_HRAESVELGR<tab>Но всегда были и те, кто намерен сражаться до конца - как ты, драгун...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_C00120_HRAESVELGR<tab>But struggle as thou might, thy youthful vigor will be spent ere thou reachest two score and ten. And Nidhogg shall remain to torment thine offspring.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_C00120_HRAESVELGR<tab>Но как бы ты не сражался, годы быстро возьмут своё, и вся твоя юношеская горячность улетучится словно дым. А Нидхогг будет жить вечно, истязая твоё потомство.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_C00130_ESTINIEN<tab>Oft have I wondered why Nidhogg did not simply raze Ishgard to the ground.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_C00130_ESTINIEN<tab>Часто я задумывался, почему Нидхогг просто не сравняет Ишгард с землёй.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_C00140_ESTINIEN<tab>Now I have my answer. He has no intention of winning the Dragonsong War, for it is no war at all, but vengeance─an eternal requiem sung for his murdered sister.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_C00140_ESTINIEN<tab>Вот и мой ответ. Он никогда и не хотел закончить Войну Драконьей Песни, ведь для него это никакая не война, но лишь акт возмездия - вечный реквием, который он поёт по своей убитой сестре.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_C00150_HRAESVELGR<tab>Thou hast the right of it, dragonslayer. Comprehendest thou now the futility of thy quest?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_C00150_HRAESVELGR<tab>Верно, убийца драконов. Теперь вы понимаете всю бессмысленность вашего похода?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_C00160_ICEHEART<tab>I have not come this far only to admit defeat. We can still return the Eye to Nidhogg, and beg forgiveness for our ancestors' crimes. Mayhap our words will sway him!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_C00160_ICEHEART<tab>Мы не для того прошли весь этот путь, чтобы сдаться. Мы всё ещё можем вернуть Око Нидхоггу, и молить прощения за грехи наших предков. Возможно, нам удастся его убедить!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_C00170_HRAESVELGR<tab>Stubborn child... Thou thinkest in mortal terms. Our perception of time is too broad for thee to grasp.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_C00170_HRAESVELGR<tab>Упрямое дитя... Ты мыслишь, как смертная. Наше восприятие времени отличается от вашего.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_C00180_HRAESVELGR<tab>'Tis a simple matter for thee to offer thine apologies─thou didst not perpetrate the crime. Despite thy visions, the deeds of history seem distant to thee.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_C00180_HRAESVELGR<tab>Просить прощения для тебя это очень просто - ведь это даже не ты совершила те грехи. Для вас события истории - лишь смутные видения, которыми я с вами поделился.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_C00190_HRAESVELGR<tab>For a wyrm such as Nidhogg, however, that history is yet part of his present, as fresh as the blood that did gush from Ratatoskr's wounds. How could he not be driven mad?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_C00190_HRAESVELGR<tab>Но для великого змия, такого как Нидхогг, эти события - неотъемлемая часть настоящего, словно бы прямо сейчас он стоит над окровавленным трупом Рататоскр. Как тут не обезуметь?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_C00200_HRAESVELGR<tab>'Tis only by the calming embrace of Shiva's soul that mine own fury hath not consumed me.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_C00200_HRAESVELGR<tab>Пылающая ярость не поглотила меня лишь благодаря успокаивающим объятиям души Шивы.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_C00210_HRAESVELGR<tab>But let us speak no more of what is done. My faith in your kind is spent, and I would be alone.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_C00210_HRAESVELGR<tab>Но хватит говорить о том, чего нельзя воротить. Моя вера в ваше племя иссякла, и я удаляюсь.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_D00010_ESTINIEN<tab>Well, what do you propose we do now? I, for one, am intent on continuing to the east...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_D00020_ALPHINAUD<tab>What is there to be found in the east?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_D00030_ESTINIEN<tab>Nidhogg's lair─the Aery─is said to lie in that direction. And the Eye tells me he is near...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_D00040_ICEHEART<tab>You cannot still mean to slay him!?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_D00050_ESTINIEN<tab>You cannot still mean to stop me. I have been true to my word, and aided you in this fool's errand with Hraesvelgr.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_D00060_ESTINIEN<tab>But your efforts at parley have come to naught, Lady Iceheart. I would see Ishgard saved, and for that, Nidhogg must die.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_D00070_ICEHEART<tab>With the tale of our ancestors' vile betrayal yet ringing in your ears, you speak of continuing this war?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_D00080_ESTINIEN<tab>Nay, lady, I would but pierce its vengeful heart. When Nidhogg dies, this war shall die with him.

TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_D00090_ALPHINAUD<tab>A moment, Estinien. You yourself spoke of the great wyrm's strength─that you believed him powerful enough to raze your city to the ground. How then are we few to challenge him?

TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_D00100_ALPHINAUD<tab>Even behind the stout walls of Ishgard─with an army of knights manning the defenses─our victory would be hard-won. Yet you propose to contend with the beast in his own lair?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_D00110_ESTINIEN<tab>In close combat, this will afford us an advantage. And if the tales are true, the Warrior of Light has bested many an invincible foe.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_D00120_ESTINIEN<tab>In close combat, this will afford us an advantage. And with two Azure Dragoons working in unison, who can say what might be possible?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_D00130_ESTINIEN<tab>But such speculation is meaningless if we cannot even find the wyrm. Our first task must be to seek out Nidhogg's lair.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_D00140_ALPHINAUD<tab>The story of this nation grows bloodier by the moment. Must death always be answered with more of the same?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_D00150_ESTINIEN<tab>Such is the way of things, I fear. I shall consider it a miracle if mine armor is not stained crimson ere this conflict is ended.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_D00160_ICEHEART<tab>That I should be blinded by my own lies... Everything I believed... Everything I thought I was... Gone... All gone...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_D00170_ESTINIEN<tab>Leave her. Your words will not reach her now. And we have not the time to wait for her to gather up the pieces of her shattered faith.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_E00010_ALPHINAUD<tab>Is that it?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_E00020_ESTINIEN<tab>Aye... That would be the Aery. I feel Nidhogg's presence through the Eye─his caustic hatred gnawing at my soul.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_E00030_ESTINIEN<tab>'Twould seem the death of his consort has put him on guard. Mark how he wards his lair with tempestuous winds.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_E00040_ALPHINAUD<tab>A similar barrier once barred our entrance to the primal Garuda's domain...until we discovered the means by which it could be penetrated.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_E00050_ALPHINAUD<tab>Mayhap it is time we called upon Master Garlond. 'Twill be just like the good old days, no?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_F00010_WEDGE<tab>Feast your eyes upon our latest and greatest feat of engineering! We call it a “manacutter”!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_F00020_BIGGS<tab>After you put down Gaius, Wedge and me struck out on our own for a bit, and started work on the successor to the <var 1A 02 /var>Tiny Bronco<var 1A 01 /var>.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_F00030_CID<tab>Impressive little thing, isn't she? My talent for ship design has plainly rubbed off on them.

TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_F00040_CID<tab>They've adapted the principles of corrupted crystal technology, and constructed a mechanism which converts aether from its surroundings into elemental wind. Said wind is then harnessed by the specially engineered sails, providing the craft with propulsion and lift. All in all, a most elegant solution...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_F00050_CID<tab>...I'm actually a little upset that I didn't think of it myself.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_F00060_WEDGE<tab>The design does, however, come with one small flaw...

TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_F00070_BIGGS<tab>The energy conversion ratio's bloody awful. To generate enough power to get you off the ground, you need to be in an area awash with predominantly wind-aspected aether.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_F00080_WEDGE<tab>In other words, there are a few places you can fly...and lots of places you can't.

TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_F00090_CID<tab>The new Ishgardian airship hasn't left the boys much time for tinkering─meaning it may be a while before this particular project takes off, if you'll forgive the pun.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_F00100_TATARU<tab>Hah...hah...hah...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_F00110_WEDGE<tab>Tataru, what's happened!?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_F00120_TATARU<tab>I've been looking all over for you! There's been word from Ul'dah! It's about Her Grace, the sultana!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_F00130_CID<tab>It seems you're required elsewhere. Leave the manacutter with us. We'll see that she's airworthy and suitably equipped to slice through those winds.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_F00140_CID<tab>You, meanwhile, should concentrate on providing Raubahn and the sultana whatever help they need!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_G00010_RAUBAHN<tab>Thank you for coming.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_G00020_ALPHINAUD<tab>No thanks are necessary, General. I trust your recuperation continues apace?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_G00030_RAUBAHN<tab>I cannot complain. Thanks to Higiri and her ministrations, I've regained much of the strength I lost during my imprisonment.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_G00040_ALPHINAUD<tab>I gather you have made progress in the search for Her Grace.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_G00050_RAUBAHN<tab>Aye, some good fortune at last. A few days past, Dewlala informed us that a sizable shipment of alchemical supplies had been delivered to the palace.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_G00060_PIPPIN<tab>With Papashan's assistance, I set out to ascertain the source and nature of the shipment. My inquiries led me to Frondale's Phrontistery.

TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_G00070_PIPPIN<tab>There I learned that an order had been placed for a curious substance designed to sustain patients trapped in deathlike slumber─an invention of the former head alchemist, apparently.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_G00080_ALPHINAUD<tab>A deathlike slumber...? This cannot be a coincidence!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_G00090_RAUBAHN<tab>It lends some weight to Dewlala's claims, aye. Her Grace is likely somewhere within the palace─abed but alive.

TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_G00100_YUGIRI<tab>Before making any attempt to extricate the sultana, however, it seemed prudent to learn what manner of substance was used to induce her torpor. To that end, I made inquiries as to the whereabouts of the one most like to have administered it─the lady-in-waiting, Meriel.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_G00110_YUGIRI<tab>We sent for you as soon as we learned of her location. All that remains is to apprehend the woman.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_G00120_RAUBAHN<tab>We shall find our cat's-paw in the Silver Bazaar.

TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_G00130_RAUBAHN<tab>But we must tread carefully. The market is not the bustling place it once was, and someone is sure to mark our coming. Should they inform the Monetarists, we'll have a fight on our hands.

TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_G00140_RAUBAHN<tab>We must be prepared for the worst─and being short an arm, I thought it wise to take another in its stead. What say you, Warrior of Light? Will you lend me yours?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_G00150_RAUBAHN<tab>Then I pity the bastard that stands in our way. Come, my friends! For Nanamo...and for Ul'dah!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_H00010_ALPHINAUD<tab>You are Meriel, the sultana's former lady-in-waiting?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_H00020_LADYINWAITING2<tab>I know no one of that name! Pray excuse me...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_H00030_LADYINWAITING2<tab>General Aldynn!?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_H00040_RAUBAHN<tab>We will have the truth from you, girl...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_H00050_LOLORITO<tab>Mayhap 'twould be better coming from me.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_H00060_RAUBAHN<tab>Lolorito... You'd best talk fast.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_H00070_LOLORITO<tab>As you know, Teledji Adeledji's Carteneau Reclamation Bill was no more than a facade─a means to get his grubby little hands on that Allagan monstrosity, Omega.

TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_H00080_LOLORITO<tab>When he learned of Nanamo's intention to abdicate, however, he was forced to amend his plans. Suddenly, assassination seemed the most promising way to further his ambitions.

TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_H00090_LOLORITO<tab>I am told Teledji had discovered a maid in whose veins ran the blood of House Thorne─a new, more pliable puppet to sit the throne. 'Twould have caused an uproar, of course, but few could have contested her claim.

TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_H00100_LOLORITO<tab>'Twas plain that Teledji's wild machinations had outgrown our ability to control them. So I decided to usurp his scheme, and left the fool to seal his own demise.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_H00110_RAUBAHN<tab>And what of Nanamo?

TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_H00120_LOLORITO<tab>Oh, I have no desire to harm Her Grace─'twould profit me little to destabilize our government. Thus did I employ young Meriel here to administer a potent sleeping potion in place of a poison.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_H00130_LOLORITO<tab>You should know, General, that your dear friend Ilberd was fully aware of my plan.

TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_H00140_LOLORITO<tab>I had him lie about the assassination as a means to prime your rage against Teledji. We weren't entirely sure how you would react, but things went rather better than expected.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_H00150_RAUBAHN<tab>You conniving little worm... You had your claws in the Crystal Braves before their first recruit had sworn to serve!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_H00160_LOLORITO<tab>But of course. When a new game begins, 'tis only prudent to have a piece on the board. Ilberd was mine.

TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_H00170_LOLORITO<tab>Truth be told, a significant proportion of the Braves' initial endowment was also mine. With such large sums moving about, 'twas a rather trifling matter to disguise my own contribution.

TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_H00180_LOLORITO<tab>Ah, Ilberd... I secured his services with a promise to support his cause once my authority had been solidified. I swear, the man thinks of naught but prising Ala Mhigo from the grasp of the Empire.

TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_H00190_LOLORITO<tab>Unlike you, General, the poor fellow seems quite unable to forsake the land of his forefathers. Mayhap that's why he called you a traitor to your people and a disgrace to your homeland...amongst other things. What was it he always compared you to? Oh, yes! “An overgrown lapdog, begging for scraps at the sultana's table!” Oh, how we laughed...

TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_H00200_LOLORITO<tab>Alas, Ilberd's entertaining little outbursts eventually gave way to wearisome tirades, and the zealous brute became rather unruly. I had no wish to see you executed, you understand, but he would not take no for an answer. Rest assured, his employment with me has long since ended.

TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_H00210_LOLORITO<tab>...Which brings us neatly to the present. What say you, General? Both you and the sultana are alive; we have one corpse and one fugitive; and preparations have been made to restore your good name. Shall we cry quits and start again with a blank ledger? Hm?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_H00220_RAUBAHN<tab>The hells we will! Do you honestly expect me to forgive and forget? After all you've done!? You're guilty of high treason!

TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_H00230_DEWLALA<tab>Stay your blade, Master Aldynn! You yourself are not innocent! Or have you forgotten your <var 1A 02 /var>own<var 1A 01 /var> crime in executing Teledji Adeledji without trial!?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_H00240_DEWLALA<tab>Though you acted out of loyalty to the sultana, such deeds are in violation of both the word and spirit of the law!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_H00250_DEWLALA<tab>...If you would, Lord Lolorito?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_H00260_LOLORITO<tab>This potion will wake the sultana from her slumber. Consider it a gesture of conciliation.

TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_H00270_LOLORITO<tab>You will find Her Grace resting comfortably within her private chambers. Should you doubt my word, I shall willingly accompany you to the palace as your hostage.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_H00280_RAUBAHN<tab>I like not your motives, Lolorito...but you saved the sultana's life, and for that you have my gratitude.

TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_H00290_DEWLALA<tab>Raubahn Aldynn, you are hereby reinstated as general of the Immortal Flames! The citizens of Ul'dah shall once more be united under Nanamo Ul Namo, and together we shall usher in a new age of prosperity!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_I00010_NANAMO<tab>Ugh...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_I00020_NANAMO<tab>I was having the longest dream...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_I00030_RAUBAHN<tab>'Tis time to wake up, Your Grace. Another day begins in Thanalan, and the sun blazes bright upon the sands.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_J00010_RAUBAHN<tab>Her Grace is awoken. The palace physician assures me she is none the worse for her slumber.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_J00020_RAUBAHN<tab>I believe Her Grace will soon resume her plans to place the government of Ul'dah into the hands of its citizens.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_J00030_RAUBAHN<tab>Whatever path she chooses to take, I shall walk it with her. And we shall tread slowly, lest the nation be unsettled in our wake.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_J00040_LOLORITO<tab>Her Grace's compassion is a shining beacon to us all...but what our city truly thrives upon is competition.

TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_J00050_LOLORITO<tab>'Tis in the struggle against our rivals that opportunities are seized and fortunes made. And with the Empire on the offensive once more, now would hardly seem the time to turn our system of government upon its head.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_J00060_ALPHINAUD<tab>Are you privy to new intelligence, my lord?

TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_J00070_LOLORITO<tab>I would hardly call it new. Remind me: what was the name of that enormous imperial warship which met its end in Mor Dhona? Wait, I have it! The <var 1A 02 /var>Agrius<var 1A 01 /var>. Yes, well, 'twould appear that the Garleans have been hard at work on another such vessel.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_J00080_PIPPIN<tab>How close are they to completing this ship!? Is it operational!?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_J00090_LOLORITO<tab>Its maiden flight was a success, I hear. I should imagine Emperor Varis is eager to see how it performs in battle.

TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_J00100_LOLORITO<tab><var 08 E905 ((My lords and ladies)) ((My lords...and lady)) /var>, I move that it is time to repair the damage caused by Teledji Adeledji, and prepare our great nation to repel the Empire once more.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_K00010_ALPHINAUD<tab>'Tis well that the sultana has awoken. The Syndicate yet needs to put its house in order, but 'twould seem the worst of the confusion has passed.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_K00020_ALPHINAUD<tab>Ul'dah has taken control of its future...and I must do the same.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_K00030_ALPHINAUD<tab>I have decided to disband the Crystal Braves.

TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_K00040_ALPHINAUD<tab>Among the recruits, there were those who supported our order's goals and convictions with all sincerity. 'Tis my hope that these loyal men and women will choose to remain our allies in the battles to come.

TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_K00050_ALPHINAUD<tab>As for those who sided with the traitor, Ilberd, they shall be hunted down and held to account for their crimes. It is my earnest hope that they will surrender themselves peaceably when the time comes...though I think it unlikely.

TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_K00060_ALPHINAUD<tab>Ah, my all-conquering Crystal Braves... The model army meant to pave the way for a single, unified Grand Company of Eorzea. That so high an ideal should be brought so low...

TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_K00070_ALPHINAUD<tab>I need not tell you how deeply the betrayal stung me. Yet I see now that it was mine own naivety and pride which allowed the Braves to fall prey to corruption.

TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_K00080_ALPHINAUD<tab>As ever, it is to your own shining example that I turn for inspiration. Like you, I mean to stand firm in the face of hardship, and give mine all for the cause.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_K00090_ALPHINAUD<tab>Let us resume the search for our missing comrades, that we might come together to shine the light of dawn across the realm once more.

TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_K00100_ALPHINAUD<tab>The role of Crystal Brave commander suited me ill, and I shall play it no longer. Henceforth, I shall be no more or less than Alphinaud, proud member of the Scions.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_L00010_ESTINIEN<tab>All stands ready, Lord Commander.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_L00020_AYMERIC<tab>Ah, the moment has come, then?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_L00030_ALPHINAUD<tab>Pray excuse my lateness. I paid a brief visit to the workshop to inquire about the manacutters. The engineers assure me that they are ready.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_L00040_ESTINIEN<tab>The Aery is now but a short flight away. Yet what a long and winding path we took to reach this point.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_L00050_ESTINIEN<tab>Were it not for Master Alphinaud's proposal, we never would have attempted to parley with the dragons.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_L00060_ESTINIEN<tab>Though our negotiations yielded little, our expedition with Lady Iceheart taught us much.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_L00070_AYMERIC<tab>You took an unimaginable risk... I could scarce believe the tale Estinien told.

TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_L00080_ESTINIEN<tab>Aye, 'tis true that many of our countrymen would sooner die than join hands with the heretics' mistress, but 'twas through that most unlikely of alliances that we came to speak with Hraesvelgr.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_L00090_ALPHINAUD<tab>A conversation that went rather poorly, as I recall.

TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_L00100_ESTINIEN<tab>In this instance, the journey was more important than the destination. Had we not slain Nidhogg's consort, Tioman, and put the great wyrm on his guard, the Dravanians would have arrived at Ishgard's walls long ago.

TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_L00110_AYMERIC<tab>Aye, that they would. Full grateful am I for every hour of respite your actions have afforded us. Thanks to you, our defenses are much improved. 'Tis but a pity they won't be enough.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_L00120_ALPHINAUD<tab>Thus you believe an assault upon the Aery represents the city's best chance of survival. Is that not so, Estinien?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_L00130_ESTINIEN<tab>I am under no illusions. Nidhogg's might is legendary. But with his eye in my possession, I can stifle his strength at the source.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_L00140_ESTINIEN<tab>Victory will be hard-won, even so, and I shall be glad indeed to have the Warrior of Light at my side.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_L00150_AYMERIC<tab>You shall have my blade as well. There are more of these “manacutters” to be had, yes?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_L00160_LUCIA<tab>(-Lucia-)Lord Commander, no!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_L00170_AYMERIC<tab>How can I, a proud knight of Ishgard, stand by and do naught while an outsider risks life and limb for our homeland? I swore an oath to protect this city!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_L00180_ESTINIEN<tab>Pray leave the slaying of dragons to dragoons, ser knight. Your duty to command the city's defense is no less vital.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_L00190_ESTINIEN<tab>Should we fail, and Nidhogg slip through our grasp, who, then, will hold the walls against him? Will you leave Ishgard in the hands of the Holy See's zealots?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_L00200_AYMERIC<tab>There are others─

TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_L00210_ESTINIEN<tab>Who but you has the authority and the standing to orchestrate a citywide defense? I do not, and neither does the Warrior of Light. That is why it is our place to fight, and yours to remain here, Lord Commander.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_L00220_ESTINIEN<tab>What, you too, Master Alphinaud? By the Fury... You have shown some promise, but this adversary is far beyond your skills.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_L00230_ALPHINAUD<tab>Your candor is appreciated, ser dragoon. I shall remain, then, and cheer you from afar.

TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_L00240_ESTINIEN<tab>Well, my friend, 'twould seem I have discouraged the last of the volunteers, and claimed the task as ours alone. But if any alive can best this wyrm, 'tis surely we two!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_M00010_ESTINIEN<tab>We're through!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_M00020_ESTINIEN<tab>So, this is the Aery! Where are you Nidhogg!? You have guests!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03003_M00030_ESTINIEN<tab>There!
